name: concrete production, 40MPa, for civil engineering, with cement, type IP | concrete, 40MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25863/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 40MPa ready-mix concrete in Peru. Density: 2'453 kg/m³ - w/c: 0.55. Ingredients (for 1 m³): cement type ICo 380 kg, Water 195 kg, Gravel 1116 kg, Sand 744kg, Admixtures (retarder 0.3%cem and superplastisizers 0.7%cem) in total 3.8kg/m3.

From reception of raw materials at the ready-mix plant gate.

This activity ends before the delivery of concrete at the construction site. The dataset includes the whole manufacturing processes to produce ready-mixed concrete, internal processes (material handling and mixing) and infrastructure. The dataset does not include: - the transport of concrete in a mixing truck.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The production volume of 2016 is considered. The data from sustainability reports goes from 2014 to 2016. Data have been reported with the production volume of corresponding year.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Representative production of ready-mix concrete 40 MPa with cement type IP in Peru. Data based from main cement producers and personal comunications with local experts.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Represent the current technology for ready-mix concrete production in Peru.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The main values are considered representative for a typical production of ready mix concrete for building construction in Peru. The infrastrucutre is included and the main emissions to water and some inputs are taken from the global dataset for ready-mix concrete production. The auxiliary material (rubber, lube oil) are based on a sampling of 34 concrete plants in Brazil.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Production data provides mostly from personal comunication with local experts and sustainability reports and general information of 2 principle cement and concrete producers of Peru (Paquasmayo and UNACEM). Data has been checked, completed and confirmed by personal communication with local experts. Unit flows were calculated by dividing the amounts of inputs and outputs by the total concrete production in mass.

defaultProvider.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/36:Water collection, treatment and supply/360:Water collection, treatment and supply/3600:Water collection, treatment and supply

exchanges.description: Calculated value. The water balance is established taking into account the total water input (withdrawal) minus the outputs, which include the water contained in the concrete, the water evaporated and the water infiltrated. In general, no waste water is produced. The water incorporated in the concrete correspond to the cement amount multiplied by w/c ratio. The share of the water evaporated to air and the water infiltrated is calculated based on the sustainability reports from Argos (60% evaporated).

exchanges.description: Calculated value. The sustainability reports of the cement manufacturers reports the electricity demand for concrete (Cementos Argos S.A, 2017; Cemex, 2017; Holcim, 2015). The data is exprapolated from Colombia. Argos 2.38E+00 Colombia value, sustainability report 2016. Holcim 3.25E+00 Colombia value, sustainability report 2015. Cemex 3.70E+00 Colombia value, sustainability report 2015. Values in kWh/m3 The value presented is calculated considering a weighted average with production volumes. Cementos Argos S.A. (2017). Energy and Co-Processing, 1-8. Cemex. (2015). Sustainability Report 2015. Holcim. (2015). Informe de Desarrollo Sostenible 2015.
